comments:
Description:
Can't preview joint dataset which extended from library in HTML/PDF

Steps to reproduce:
Use attached design file and library, preview the design file in Web Viewer, it works well, but when preview in HTML and PDF, ScriptEvaluationError shows up

Error log:
The following items have errors: 


Data (id = 45): 
- There are errors evaluating script "row["new_library.Data Set::OFFICECODE"]".

Created an attachment (id=49185)
library with joint dataset

Stable reproduce steps:
1. Copy attached files to workspace
2. Preview in Web Viewer
3. Preview in HTML, the ScriptEvaluationError will show up
The failure is with rptdocument. And need to fix problems in DocumentUtil. When do not use rptdocument, preview is OK. Please see attachements for successful cases.

Created an attachment (id=49289)
successful view for html

Created an attachment (id=49290)
successful view for pdf
Sometimes html,pdf preview were OK. Sometimes they failed. Besides DocumentUtil issue, need to look this issue too.
Do not save library namespace to the extended joint data sets. Fixed codes in data and model parts.

(From update of attachment 49186)
After this issue was solved, this design file is obsolete, will attach a valid one

Created an attachment (id=49364)
Valid report design
